title: What are you like when you are angry?

questions.title: What are you like when you are angry?
questions.desc: What natural phenomenon do you become when you get mad?

results.title: %%userfirstname%% You Are
results.desc: Incredible! When %%userfirstname%% gets mad, better not be nearby unless you want to lose pieces of yourself! But at the same time, to make someone as amazing really angry, it actually takes quite a lot!
